chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Next we will study HTML level 3

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In level 3 we will talk about 2 important concepts of HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We will understand this level in 2 parts

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: First we will discuss in detail how tables are formed in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: How we can manipulate tables

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And second we will understand forms in detail in HTML

chunks.text: In real life we have seen many websites, apps, applications

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Where we have seen tables and forms

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Today we will understand how we can display a table or form on our website

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: First we will start with HTML tables

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We have seen many tables in real life

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The most basic example of which is our attendance in school

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: The name can be Sudhir, roll number can be 10

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Although in school our roll numbers were run with sequence

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now when we talk about HTML table

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now before reading tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We have to understand some table names and characteristics

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: To understand any table, we have to understand two attributes

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: One is row and one is column

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now if we are coming from the background of maths

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Then we must have learned about rows and columns many times

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We make many tables in commerce

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now let's understand the basics

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: What is row?

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If we analyze any data in this straight line

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: In horizontal line

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So this is my row 1

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This is my row 2

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This data is written in row 3

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This data is written in row 4

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: This data is written in row 5

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Row means when we see a line of data horizontally

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So we call it row

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Similarly column means when we see a line of data vertically

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So this is my column 1

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And this is my column 2

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So all the data of the table is divided in the form of rows and columns

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: I can call any data in this way

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: That this data comes in my single row

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or this data comes in my single column

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now the main row in my rows and columns

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: That means in which we are writing a heading

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We can also call this as header of my table

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Header means

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We have already learned what is header in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Header means the main part

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or the part which tells about the heading

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Or the main content

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We call it as header in section HTML pages

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Similarly, the part which tells us about the main content of the table

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We call it as header of any table

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Now there is a unique thing in tables

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: That header cannot be here

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: If we want, we can make a header of any random row in the middle

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Logically, we don't do this in 99% practical cases

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: And all the data we are showing

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: It looks like a normal real-life table

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: So whenever we talk about tables

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: We have to remember two things

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Table is a combination of rows and columns

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Rows are on our horizontal side

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Columns are on our vertical side

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML
chunks.text: Similarly, tables also have a caption

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

chunks.title: Tables in HTML

text: Next we will study HTML level 3 In level 3 we will talk about 2 important concepts of HTML We will understand this level in 2 parts First we will discuss in detail how tables are formed in HTML How we can manipulate tables And second we will understand forms in detail in HTML In real life we have seen many websites, apps, applications Where we have seen tables and forms Today we will understand how we can display a table or form on our website First we will start with HTML tables We have seen many tables in real life The most basic example of which is our attendance in school In attendance, a table was made in the register In that table, above everything was written name And with that our roll number And it is possible that many more details are written So here it is possible that this is my upper part Where the name can be Aman, roll number can be 24 The name can be Shraddha, roll number can be 86 The name can be Rajat, roll number can be 12 The name can be Sudhir, roll number can be 10 Although in school our roll numbers were run with sequence But when data is organized in this way We call this as my data is organized in the form of a table The data in the table is used to represent real life table data When we are making tables in HTML We are organizing our data in the same way So if I see this much part So this is my HTML visualized in the form of a table Now when we talk about HTML table There are different parts of the table that we have to understand If this table is formatted better Then we can draw our table in this way So my table will appear in the proper format So I can call this as my table And we can create similar tables in HTML Now before reading tables in HTML We have to understand some table names and characteristics To understand any table, we have to understand two attributes One is row and one is column Now if we are coming from the background of maths Then we must have learned about rows and columns many times We make many tables in commerce Now let's understand the basics What is row? If we analyze any data in this straight line In horizontal line So this is my row 1 This is my row 2 This data is written in row 3 This data is written in row 4 This data is written in row 5 Row means when we see a line of data horizontally So we call it row Similarly column means when we see a line of data vertically So this is my column 1 And this is my column 2 So all the data of the table is divided in the form of rows and columns I can call any data in this way That this data comes in my single row Or this data comes in my single column Now the main row in my rows and columns That means in which we are writing a heading We can also call this as header of my table Header means We have already learned what is header in HTML Header means the main part Or the part which tells about the heading Or the main content We call it as header in section HTML pages Similarly, the part which tells us about the main content of the table We call it as header of any table Now there is a unique thing in tables That header cannot be here If we want, we can make a header of any random row in the middle Logically, we don't do this in 99% practical cases And all the data we are showing It looks like a normal real-life table So whenever we talk about tables We have to remember two things Table is a combination of rows and columns Rows are on our horizontal side Columns are on our vertical side Now let's talk about If I have to recreate any table in HTML Then what syntax will we use for that There is some syntax like this There is some syntax to create any table in HTML Which starts with a table tag As soon as I write a table tag in my code Similarly, I will start creating a table But the table will not be created Like if I open my HTML document And here I have already made a file named classroom.html In which the boilerplate code is already written I have kept its title as HTML level 3 All the other things are the same I am going to write a table tag in the body So I have created a table like this If I save it, then both came on the same line Because the table is empty now And I am going to open this classroom.html So the page I have made is completely empty So it was understood that just writing a table Does not create a table To create a table in HTML There should be some actual data inside the table Because an empty table is nothing So let's talk about how we can add data in HTML tables Our table will look like this In which I have given a title in a table We can call it the title of the table Otherwise, we also call it a caption in HTML We must have seen the caption word many times before When we post photos on Instagram We post photos and videos on Facebook So there is always a text with the photo Which describes what is going on in this photo It is called a caption in common language That it is a caption of that photo Similarly, tables also have a caption The caption of the table tells What kind of data is inside the table Like I have written the data of item and price in this table We can say that this is a menu In which the price of fruity is 10 rupees The price of samosa is 12 rupees The price of chips is 20 rupees And this is my food menu Similarly, the table I made earlier We can call it student data So the caption of this table could have been student data So the first thing we can describe about any table Is its caption What kind of content will come inside this table To describe the caption We are writing the caption tag Whatever we write inside the caption tag It becomes a caption of my table To create the same table in my HTML file I can write caption And we will be writing food menu inside it So I am going to make a food menu Which is usually given in restaurants Or in canteens We are going to visualize the same menu On a webpage After that we get some tags First I can see this TR tag Then I can see this TH tag Inside this there is header 1, header 2, data 1, data 2 There is a TD tag I can see different tags inside So whatever data is shown inside a table Whether it is header data or normal text data Header data means the heading Like this white text highlighted in black This is my header data Because it is highlighted part of my table And this is my normal table data So we can visualize different types of data In different forms of tags Inside a table To represent the data We read 3 different types of tags in HTML First is TR tag TR tag's job is to create rows inside the table If I am going to create a row Inside this table I can see the rows I can create rows If I have made this type of table So this is my row 1 About which we have already read This is my row 2 This is my row 3 and this is my row 4 To create this row I will use a TR tag To create this row To create this row And similarly all the rows inside a table For every individual row I have to write a TR tag Whatever content is inside the TR tag All the content will show The content of a particular row For example If I have to make this table I have to use 4 TR tags So what do we do with 4 TR tags We create them inside our table This is my first tag This is my second, third and fourth To create 4 rows I have used 4 TR tags The second type of tag which we study Is my TD tag TD tag shows The data of a table And TD is the same as TH tag Which shows the header of a table We can also remember this in full form T is common in all tags R stands for row D stands for data And H stands for header So we can remember it like this When we have to display data Then TD tag is there When we have to make a row then TR tag is there When we have to show header then TH tag is there So if I analyze this table The row at the top What is there inside it It has a header So I will use TH tag I have made a row But what type of data should be there inside the row That will be shown by my TH tag This is my normal data So my TD tag will be there TD tag will be there inside this We can understand it like this If I have created a row For that I will use TR tag So I have written TR tag here But if I have to show header inside the row Then I will use TH tag Like this But if I want to show normal data inside the row Then for that I have to make a row Like this And inside that we will create TD tag So like this I will make a row with normal data And like this we will make a row with header data Same thing we have seen in the previous syntax That here I have written TD tag And like this we have seen in the previous syntax That here I have created a row But inside the row I will give two headers So for headers I have used TH tag I will write header1 For this table header1 will be Item For this table What will be the second thing in the header I will have price So I can write it here Price So my first row is over After that I will create second row Inside the second row Because I have to display normal data So I will use TD tag Inside TD and TH tags Single item will be displayed Single item display means It is a single cell Single cell means only this much part Which takes one row and one column This much part which takes one row and one column We call it a cell inside the table So to display the first cell I will write data1 here And to display the second cell Means to display this cell I can cut and write data2 here Which is going to be equal to 10 So what we are going to do We will recreate this table in our HTML code I used 4 TR tags To display 4 rows Now if we talk about the first row In the first row I have header tag So I have two header items One heading is item and one heading is price So inside TR tag First I will make TH tag Inside this I will write item And second heading That will be equal to price We will make it capital P This is the first row Now let's talk about the second row Inside the second row The first data which I have to display is fruity Second data which I have to display is 10 Is this header type data No, this is not header type data This is a normal data cell So for this I will use TD tag Here I am going to write fruity And in the second line also I am going to write 10 Similarly, these same things Will be replicated in the next row And in the next row also So what is this format I used TR tags to create row And inside that I have displayed header Again I used TR tag to display row And inside that I have displayed data Let's save this And here I am going to refresh my page So I can see some things like this Now this is not the same table As we want to make Because the main thing inside this Is a border missing Means no lines are visible So for now we are going to ignore those lines For now let's focus on data When we will focus on data Then I will know that item and price Is in bold Means all the things which are displayed Are displayed in normal text form But the header which I made Item and price is displayed in bold So all the headers of tables Are displayed in bold by default If we want we can change any styling In CSS but we have not read CSS yet So we will be using basic raw HTML The data below is normally visible And the caption of my table Which was food menu Is visible like this Now in all rows Fruity 10 is written So let's change our items In first row it is fruity 10 In second row we are going to write Samosa and rupees 12 And in third row we are going to write Chips and rupees 20 Let's save and refresh So like this my data is visible If I want I can do a small thing Means in my code In my table I will write border Is equal to black And after saving it If I refresh it I will see that a border is created Now this border thing which I added What happened with this This border is created This is a hack In HTML only CSS has a way So the border which I have created Is actually part of CSS And in this way to create a border Is not a good idea But for clarity I am showing you When table is completely ready Then it has a border But because we have not learned CSS yet So the border and all the styling Which is related to table We are learning it in CSS time So we are ignoring it We are not seeing that beautiful table We are just understanding the functionality of table So let's refresh it again So my border is gone And in this way I have created a table With which we started
